alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 1:21PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coconino County through 200 PM MST... At 121 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Big Water to 14 miles northwest of House Rock to near Pipe Spring. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Page, Big Five, LeChee, Marble Canyon, Jacob Lake, Lees Ferry, Antelope Canyon Near Sr 98, House Rock, Wahweap, Antelope Creek Basin, Jacob Lake Campground and Waterholes Canyon. This includes the following highways... State Route 98 between mile markers 548 and 549. U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 535 and 556. U.S. Highway 89A between mile markers 532 and 548, and between mile markers 559 and 607. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
